original_text: So we prayed to the Lord, the God of our ancestors. He heard our prayers. He saw that we were in trouble. He saw that we had to do very hard work for cruel people.
korean_text: 우리가 우리 조상의 하나님 여호와께 부르짖었더니 여호와께서 우리 음성을 들으시고 우리의 고통과 신고와 압제를 보시고

sentences.original_text: So we prayed to the Lord
He saw that we were in trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 우리가 곤경에 처한 것을 보셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He saw that we had to do very hard work
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 우리가 아주 힘든 일을 해야 하는 것을 보셨습니다
